abstracts.cdata!:
The development objective of the
            Decentralized Urban Capacity Building Project for Burkina
            Faso is to strengthen the delivery of urban services at the
            municipal level with special emphasis on Ouagadougou,
            Bobo-Dioulasso, Koudougou, Banfora, Ouahigouya and Kaya. The
            restructuring consists of the following: amendment of the
            financing agreement to include a new category of
            expenditure; and reallocation of the project proceeds among
            the categories of expenditures as specified in annex one.
            This is the second amendment to the financing agreement.
